LanguageData.Lact-X.label: lact-X
LanguageData.Lact-X.description:
A Drug that induces lactation, it also has an addictive euphoric affect. 
 
 Take every 3 days for uninterrupted flow. 
 
 No lactation effect on animals.
LanguageData.Lact-MAX.label: lact-MAX
LanguageData.Lact-MAX.description: A Drug that induces lactation permanently, it causes addiction to Lact-X. \n \n No lactation effect on animals.
